 borderColor0: ccc(data)
可是我在ccc这个方法里不知道当前项的值，请问怎么能取到

thanks, I found the problem is using elementUI tab component, if I put the echartDiv out of tab component, there will be render expectation. I will track this problem. ```js
```
提问题这么不客气，活该被秒关了

你们应该对 `getElementById` 方法返回的对象做显式的转换，因为它返回的不一定都是 `init` 方法所要求的 `HTMLDivElement` 或 `HTMLCanvasElement` 对象，也有可能是其他继承了 `HTMLElement` 的对象。
所以你们的代码中应该做如下的转换：
```javascript
const el = document.getElementById('target') as HTMLDivElement;
````
这个问题是div嵌套canvas，换了canvas之后可以正常
V3树图什么时候才能搞定啊 @pissang

@pissang 大神，你好！
   请问我这个问题能解决吗？ 谢谢

The key of the problem is let the init dom have `clientWidth` or `clientHeight`. When to use the element tab component and you don't set the init value of `el-tabs`, the mouted lifecycle to init echarts will be failed. So you can do like this: ```html
``` ```javascript export default { name: 'Layout', data () { return { firstTabValue: '1' } } } ``` If the echart tab-pane don't first display, you could trigger setOption in the @tab-click event If someone find the better solution, please tell me, thanks.

我的问题和你一样， 也是x轴变了， 给我返回的数据有误， 希望你可以找到解决方法， 然后告诉我一下，我感觉这是框架的原因 ，根本不知道从哪改。
https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/6531

我这里暂时的解决方法是，在切换数据前先将数据缩放重置为全选，参考代码如下
```javascript
           optionAttack.dataZoom = [{
                type: 'slider',
                show: true,
                xAxisIndex: [0],
                start: 0,
                end: 100
            }]
            attackCurveChart.setOption(optionAttack, { notMerge: true })
            optionAttack.xAxis[0].data = attackToday.xData;
            optionAttack.series[0].data = attackToday.yData;
            attackCurveChart.setOption(optionAttack, { notMerge: true })
```
但是这样感觉治标不治本

@jarben These kinds of charts can be achieved by either [scatter series](http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xSy6oGlXOW), [pictorial bar series](http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html#pictorialBar-spirit), or more universally, [custom series](http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html#custom-hexbin).
Bar chart is now supported. See [example 1](http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html#bar-polar-stack) and [example 2](http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html#bar-polar-stack-radial)

Hi @Ovilia , yeah, that's a good point. Although layout would need to be computed manually which is probably fine for the parliament map. I think the dot matrix chart is pretty general and could be in theory shipped out of the box? Anyway, thanks for your answer, the recent custom series is definitely so powerful!

I am being puzzled with this issue:

When I set system timezone as "Time Zone: America/Toronto",
those code will get different result:

```js
new Date(1478411999999).getTimezoneOffset();  // get 240
new Date(1478412000000).getTimezoneOffset();  // get 300
```

Do you know any hint about this issue?
@jarben Thanks for your advice!

itemStyle 里面先 normal 再 color，参见：http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-candlestick.itemStyle.normal.color
你把 GPS 和百度地图的放两个图，然后把百度地图的那个图表 dispose 掉

@lisachristina1234 Here's how you can test it:

1. Delete some data each time and check if it works
2. If you find the data that may cause the difference, check if there's a circle or anything strange with that data
3. Draw the relationship of the data if you can't find anything else.

You see, there's much you can do to debug it, rather than providing the whole data and hoping for someone to save your time.
Wish you good luck! :)
这个行吗？http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-effectScatter.type 加上 http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#series-effectScatter.itemStyle.normal.shadowBlur 应该能够模拟的
可以用 http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#graphic.elements-text.type 加一个文字，等有数据了再把这个去掉，ECharts 没有自动这样做的功能
需要自己寻找并下载相关地图，参考：http://echarts.baidu.com/faq.html#map-chart
